info.sourceTextContent: Por las mañanas, cuando abren la ventanita que da al tejado... Quisiera leértelo... Dice: «Era una hermosa mañana del mes de Mayo. Parecía que la Naturaleza...». =(Con desvarío.)= En esto tocan a la puerta. Es un lacayo con una carta llena de billetes de Banco.
info.suspiciousTextContent: In the morning, when they open the window overlooking the roof ... I would like read it to you ... He says: "It was a beautiful morning in the month of May. It seemed that Nature ...». = (With madness.) = In this knock on the door. It is a footman with a letter full of bank notes
